paper.title: An R & D Project Dealing with Mechanical Bits and Pieces in Real Option Analysis
paper.abstract: The goal of this paper is to study the R&D project under incomplete information. We extend the multi-step quadrinomial option pricing model through a practical case, which is the R&D project of the machinery to deal with mechanical bits and pieces. We pricing the real options valuation (ROV) of the project and show a decision tree, which can provide managers flexible decisions to analyze technology and market uncertainty.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是扩展多步四叉树期权定价模型，并将其应用于实物期权估值（ROV），这属于衍生品定价的范畴。论文的主要研究方向是定价模型的应用，而非金融风险管理或投资组合管理。
